requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8370 (4.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD equivalent or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
